Sorry for saying a stupid question but what are caltrops?????And what are those small discs with very sharp edges?????(how are they called)
 
Edy

Nate Ledbetter <ltdomer98@...> wrote:

--- samurai_dokoro <samurai_dokoro@...> wrote:

my question is that is it really true
> that ninjas also 
> use steel bars to pry open shut and locked doors? 

You mean, like a crowbar? Um, yeah. But that's hardly
a "ninja" tool. 

is
> it also true 
> that they use caltrops to injure or even kill their
> pursuers?  

Well, according to the ninja museum in Iga-Ueno, yes.
I'm not sure about "killing" them--I'm assuming you
mean poisoning the caltrops, because I don't see how
else it could kill anybody. They did use them, quite a
few varieties, in fact. 
> 
>
